I am a <nowiki>[[http://www.ceid.upatras.gr/|computer engineer]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.cs.uoi.gr/|MSc]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.ecedu.upatras.gr/|PhD]]</nowiki>,
appointed since 2000 as an I.T. teacher in Ioannina, Greece. I've been developing open source software for more than 3 decades. Since 2009 I'm the lead developer in a <nowiki>[[http://ts.sch.gr/ellak|Greek school tech support team]]</nowiki> that supports 1000+ schools using Ubuntu/LTSP, and since 2012 I'm in charge of the <nowiki>[[https://blogs.sch.gr/plinetio/|public I.T. office]]</nowiki> that supports the secondary schools of Ioannina.

=== Contributions ===
I'm the lead developer of:
* <nowiki>[[https://ltsp.org|LTSP]]</nowiki>: Linux netbooting solution
* <nowiki>[[https://epoptes.org|Epoptes]]</nowiki>: computer lab management and monitoring tool
* <nowiki>[[https://ts.sch.gr/wiki/linux/ltsp/|sch-scripts]]</nowiki>: Greek LTSP server administration software
* <nowiki>[[https://alkisg.mysch.gr|GLOSSA]]</nowiki>: IDE and interpreter for a Greek programming language for high schools
* <nowiki>[[http://www.ecedu.upatras.gr/algorithmics/|Algorithmics]]</nowiki>: high schools programming activities
* <nowiki>[[https://github.com/photodentro|Preschool activities]]</nowiki>: HTML5 preschool activities

Other open source related contributions:
* I'm a <nowiki>[[https://qa.debian.org/developer.php?login=alkisg%40gmail.com|Debian maintainer]]</nowiki>
* I've set up and been maintaining the <nowiki>[[https://alkisg.mysch.gr/steki|"Steki" forum]]</nowiki> where Greek IT teachers exchange concerns and ideas, with more than 10 million page hits since 2001
* I've converted about 5 Gb of Windows-based Greek education software so that they run under Linux, packaged them in .debs and put them in <nowiki>[[http://ts.sch.gr/repo-pages/pi-logismiko|repositories]]</nowiki> so that now installing all the necessary packages for e.g. a high school is as simple as ~-apt-get install gymnasio-~
* I've been helping in <nowiki>[[https://ts.sch.gr/wiki/linux/support/|IRC channels]]</nowiki>, in forums, writing <nowiki>[[https://ts.sch.gr/wiki/linux/ltsp/|wiki pages]]</nowiki>, manuals, submitting bug reports and patches and generally helping out wherever I can

My <nowiki>[[https://github.com/alkisg|github]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~alkisg|launchpad]]</nowiki> pages have more details on those.
